pageTitle: Patent US5283861 - Remote control of a local processor console - Google Patents
textBeforeTable: Patent Citations Based on the foregoing, computer systems and processes according to the present invention have been disclosed. However, numerous modifications and substitutions can be made without deviating from the scope of the invention. For example, a complete program could be substituted for the remote console 16 and human operator to form a completed, automated operator for application 36.
